oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pioneer Rhythm Boys - WHFB - 1949-11-26
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pioneer Rhythm Boys radio show for station WHFB, Benton Harbor, MI. Originally broadcast Saturday November 26, 1949 at 11:30 am. Featuring (verbally identified) band members Bud 'The Deacon' Wheeler, Ray 'The Professor' Watkins, Rex Watkins and Butch. Announcer unknown. Sponsored by Bill's Auto Service and Al's Grocery.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Pioneer Rhythm Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Announcer opening statement -- All The World Is Lonely Now -- Bill's Auto Service commercial -- Announcer introduces Butch -- I'm Throwing Rice (At The Girl That I Love) -- Announcer introduces Rex -- Galway Bay -- Al's Grocery Store commercial -- Silver Bells -- Theme -- Announcer closing statement
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WHFB (Radio station : Benton Harbor, Mich.); Pioneer Rhythm Boys
